short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fully autonomous AI agent for ğ• / Twitter. Takes into context full threads and replies.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best AI reply generator for ğ• (Twitter).

Ready to become one of the top reply guys/gals on ğ• ?

- Top quality replies:
Ninja X takes into account full threads and other replies to the tweet. This results in better and higher quality generated replies. When it comes to AI prompting, better context equals better results.

- Simple UX:
Just click the Ninja X button beside the reply textbox of any tweet. Instantly, you'll get an top notch reply directly pasted into the textbox! Review it, click post and you're done!

- Auto mode:
Let it run fully automatically by clicking "Start" in the left sidebar of Twitter.

Get started for free and see the magic for yourself!
